content: *this cuddly bunny blanket buddy is a easy gift for a baby or child lion brand yarn * lion brand pattern # 50722 skill level easy velvetspun article #580 2 balls knitting needles - size 10 5 \ 6 5 mm knitting needles - size 8 \ 5 mm small amount black worsted weight yarn to embroider face small amount fiberfill stuffing cuddly toy is worked in one piece gauge is not important for this project the head should be worked tightly enough to hold the stuffing some construction required to finish see also bunny blanket buddy #50722-2 crochet 1 similar pattern cuddly bunny #60635 2 is knit in lion brand sasha super bulky 1 http //www ravelry com/patterns/library/bunny-blanket-buddy-50722-2-crochet 2 http //www ravelry com/patterns/library/cuddly-bunny-60635
